@Loveandpower wrote:

Just realized I was totally off topic lol…sorry second I’ll find what you wanted…

just set a void in client.java

public void loginMessage() { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("@red@"+playerName+" has logged in."); } } } }

Just convert to delta

@durial12 wrote:

if (playerRights == 0) { talk(+ playerName + " has logged in."); } if (playerRights == 1) { talk("Moderator" + playerName + " has logged in."); } if (playerRights == 2) { talk("Administrator" + playerName + " has logged in."); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lucky")) { talk("co-Owner & Coder" + playerName + " has logged in."); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ninja")) { talk("lened of HybridPking" + playerName + " has logged in!"); }

item.title: 3 error's [317 delta]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You forgot the quotations.

Try this:

if (playerRights == 0) { talk(""+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerRights == 1) { talk(Moderator "+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerRights == 2) { talk("Administrator "+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lucky")) { talk("Co-Owner & Coder "+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ninja")) { talk("legend of HybridPking "+playerName+" has logged in!"); }

But i have a suggestion, why not use yell instead of talk?

If you choose to do so, here it is:

if (playerRights == 0) { yell(""+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerRights == 1) { yell(Moderator "+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerRights == 2) { yell("Administrator "+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lucky")) { yell("Co-Owner & Coder "+playerName+" has logged in."); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ninja")) { yell("legend of HybridPking "+playerName+" has logged in!"); }

But take out normal players because if you get a lot of players, thats all you will see, players logging in.

Read full topic
